original_title: Debate on DDR programme extended by two hours
original_body_lines: The debate on the domestic debt restructuring programme has been extended by a further two hours, Chief Opposition Whip Lakshman Kiriella told journalists a short while ago.
He said the government has decided to extend the time for the debate.
The vote on the resolution will be taken up at 9.30 pm tonight.(Yohan Perera and Ajirh Siriwardana)
